in_ports.description: Set the angle of the shaft in degrees, from 0 to 180.
in_ports.name: ANGLE

in_ports.description: Set duty cycle width in microseconds. Shoudln't be less or greater than min and max values, defined on options.
in_ports.name: DUTY_CYCLE

members.description: Pulse width range, in microseconds, corresponding to the minimum (0-degree) angle on the servo until the maximum (180-degree) angle.
members.name: duty_cycle_range

members.description: Period, in microseconds. A pulse repetition rate of 50 Hz should work with most servos.
members.name: period

members.description: Label of the desired pin on the board. If raw is set to true, this should be "<device> <channel>" pair, e.g. "0 3".
members.name: pin

members.description: Change 'pin' meaning to be the system parameters needed to address the desired pin. Use it if you know what you are doing.
members.name: raw
